fields.name: Arrow Securities
fields.admin_html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="RedwoodArrowSecurities">
  <head>
		<title>Arrow Securities Admin</title>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodAdmin.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/RedwoodArrowSecurities.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/admin.js"></script>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css">
		<script type="text/javascript">
			{{ js }}
		</script>
		<style type="text/css">
			{{ css }}
		</style>
	</head>

	<body ng-include="'/static/experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/admin.html'"></body>

</html>

fields.html:
{% verbatim %}
Economics Experiment
  • User ID: {{$root.user_id}}
Please wait for experiment to start...
{% endverbatim %}
fields.name: Wait

fields.html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="RedwoodArrowSecurities">
	<head>
		<title>Start</title>

		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery-ui.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
		  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}ExperimentComponents/js/configManager.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/RedwoodArrowSecurities.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/start.js"></script>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/themes/base/jquery-ui.css">
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css">
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/start.css">
		<script type="text/javascript">
			{{ js }}
		</script>
		<style type="text/css">
			{{ css }}
		</style>
	</head>
  <body ng-include="'/static/experiments/redwood-arrow-securities/start.html'"></body>
</html>
fields.name: Start

fields.html:
{% verbatim %}
Economics Experiment
  • User ID: {{$root.user_id}}
PeriodPointsEarnings
{{$index + 1}}{{points | number:2}}${{points | number:2}}
Average:{{($root.totalPoints / ($root.period - 1) || 0) | number:2}}${{($root.totalPoints / ($root.period - 1) || 0) | number:2}}
Total:{{$root.totalPoints | number:2}}${{$root.totalPoints | number:2}}
{% endverbatim %}
fields.name: Finish
